personalized_coaching_paragraph: Achieve your goals faster and transform your life with personalized online guidance from a dedicated nutritionist.
certified_specialists_desc: Work with experienced, certified professionals dedicated to your growth.
virtual_consultation_desc: Speak with your specialist through a fully online service designed for your convenience.
personalized_plans_info: Get plans tailored to your unique needs and goals.
flexible_scheduling_info: Book sessions at times that fit your busy lifestyle.
ongoing_support_info: Track your progress and adjust your plan whenever needed for lasting results.
book_desc: Schedule your free session in just a few clicks.
meet_desc: Step into your online session with our specialist and start your journey.
transform_desc: Start taking action today and see real results unfold.
our_blog_desc: Our blog is a treasure trove of informative and engaging articles written by our team of nutritionists, dietitians, and wellness experts.
quantum_computing_desc: Dive into the basics of quantum mechanics and its applications in the tech world.
living_tips_desc: Explore simple ways to improve your health and wellness.
top_ten_destinations_desc: Uncover amazing locations to explore around the globe.
ques_two: How long does it take to complete a project?
ques_three: What industries do you work with?
ques_four: How do you ensure quality in your work?
ques_five: Can I customize the services to fit my needs?
footer_msg: Empowering your wellness journey with expert nutrition and personalized support. Start living healthier today.
our_pricing_desc: At Nutritionist, we offer flexible pricing options to accommodate your unique requirements and budget. Our goal is to provide you with exceptional personalized nutrition coaching that is accessible and tailored to your needs. Choose from our three plans below and take the first step towards a healthier lifestyle.
about_veda_desc1: At Veda, we’re committed to empowering your health journey through personalized, expert-led nutrition and wellness care—delivered entirely online, from the comfort of your home.
about_veda_desc2: Our team of licensed and certified dietitians creates tailored plans to support your unique health goals, whether you're aiming for weight management, addressing a medical condition, or adopting a healthier lifestyle.
about_veda_desc3: With flexible subscription options and on-demand support, we make it easy to stay on track—on your schedule.
about_veda_desc4: Experience the ease of virtual consultations, comprehensive health assessments, and customizable wellness packages designed to fit your lifestyle.
about_veda_desc5: Start your transformation with Veda—your first step toward a healthier, more balanced life.
our_blog_msg: Welcome to the Blog section of Nutritionist, your trusted source for insightful articles, tips, and expert advice on nutrition and wellness. Here, we strive to provide you with engaging and informative content that will inspire and empower you to make informed decisions about your health. Explore our blog to discover a wealth of resources that cover a wide range of topics related to nutrition, fitness, and overall well-being.
conclusion_desc: Consistency and self-compassion are key. Start small, stay persistent, and enjoy your journey to a healthier you in 2025!
chat_consultations: Chat consultations available within business hours
complimentary_items: Complimentary Items(Gift box include Water bottle , scale)
welcome_to_veda_desc: These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our site, you agree to these Terms.
term_one_desc: Veda Nutritionist provides nutrition consultation and health-related information. Any advice is for informational purposes and does not replace professional medical diagnosis or treatment.
term_two_desc: You agree to provide accurate information when using our services and to use the site lawfully. You are responsible for maintaining confidentiality of any account details.
term_three_desc: If you book consultations, payments must be completed as specified. Refunds or cancellations follow the policy described at the time of booking.
term_four_desc: All content on this site, including text, images, and logos, is owned by Veda Nutritionist and protected by copyright laws. You may not copy or distribute content without permission.
term_five_desc: Veda Nutritionist is not liable for any damages arising from your use of the site or services, including health-related decisions based on information provided.
term_six_desc: Your personal data is handled according to our Privacy Policy.
term_seven_desc: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the site means you accept any changes.
term_eight_desc: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates.
terms_help: If you have questions, please contact us at [info@letsveda.com].
veda_privacy_policy_desc: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.
policy_one_desc: We may collect the following information:
policy_one_desc2: Health and dietary information you provide during consultations
policy_one_desc3: Usage data such as IP address and browsing behavior on our site
policy_two_desc2: Communicate with you about appointments and updates
policy_three_desc: We do not sell or rent your personal data. We may share information with trusted third parties only when necessary to provide our services (e.g., payment processors).
policy_four_desc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.
policy_five_desc: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also opt out of marketing communications at any time.
policy_six_desc: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.
policy_seven_desc: Our services are not directed at individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.

thank.title: Thank You for Booking!
thank.subtitle1: Your journey to a healthier you starts now
thank.subtitle2: We're excited to help you unlock your best self
thank.emailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to your inbox with all the details of your session.

1.title: Check your email
1.desc: You'll receive a confirmation with session details and a calendar invite

2.title: Complete your health profile
2.desc: Fill out a brief questionnaire to help us understand your goals better

3.title: Join your session
3.desc: Meet with your dedicated nutritionist at the scheduled time

thank.supportText: Our support team is here to assist you with any questions about your session.
thank.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
thank.quoteAuthor: You've just taken yours. Welcome aboard!
